definition: point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items
abbr. for Heilongjiang province 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1]
to take possession of/to occupy/to take up
important point/main point/focus/key (project etc)/to focus on/to put the emphasis on

sentences.english: The remote search server is a single point of failure.
sentences.chinese: 遠程搜索服務器是一個單點故障點。
這些勞累的孩子直到7點纔回家。

sentences.english: But sooner or later we will return to our emotional set-point.
sentences.chinese: 但是遲早我們會返回到我們的情感點。

sentences.english: When the markets opened the following Monday, the Dow bid adieu to 10000 for good.
sentences.chinese: 股市在緊接着的週一開盤時就告別了10000點。

sentences.english: I have a coupon for five dollars off a steak dinner.
sentences.chinese: 我有一張點牛排可以少五元的折價券。
孩子們，安靜點!咱們開始吧。

sentences.english: Having data sets with a non-white space character separating the data points is a very common occurrence.
sentences.chinese: 最常見的就是數據集合不使用空格字符分隔數據點。

sentences.english: He has a better eye for similarities among cultures than for diversities.
sentences.chinese: 他看各種文化之間的相似點比看其相異點更爲透徹。

sentences.english: Afterwards, we go back in for another lesson until lunch at 12:00.
sentences.chinese: 之後，我們回教室上另一節課，至到12點喫午飯。

sentences.english: That's all the chocolate ice cream.
sentences.chinese: 就剩下這麼點巧克力冰淇淋了。

sentences.english: We left there at 5:00pm, and we were all very happy for this excursion.
sentences.chinese: 我們下午5點離開，我們都在這次郊遊中玩得很高興。

sentences.english: Now I'm going to take the torque about point Q.
And if you sleep at 2am, you only have 1 hour to detoxify.
sentences.chinese: 如果你在凌晨2點睡覺，就只有1小時排毒時間。

sentences.english: It was 14:00 when I got up today.
sentences.chinese: 今天當我起牀時已經是14點。

sentences.english: Let's have something with a local flavor .
sentences.chinese: 咱們來喫點有地方風味的東西。

sentences.english: Silent lamb The freshly-made lambs are sold at the commercial area with many tourists.
sentences.chinese: 《沉默的羔羊》在遊人衆多的商業點，羔羊現殺現賣。
